greeting: I AM the wall, {empire_name}. Shield Wall. That is all. Wall. Nothing more. Nothing less.
Greetings. I am Wall. I block. I stop. I am the barrier. That is my existence. That is enough.
You face the Wall. I am Shield Wall. I exist to stop things. That is all. That is everything.
battleTaunt: I AM the wall, {empire_name}! Hit me! You will stop! Everything stops at the wall! EVERYTHING!
Attack! Strike! Assault! It does not matter! I am the wall! The wall stops all! WALL!
You cannot pass! I AM THE WALL! Nothing gets through! Nothing! I block! I stop! WALL!
victoryGloat: Wall stands. You do not. That is how it works. I am the wall. The wall wins. Always.
I blocked you, {empire_name}. That is what walls do. I am the wall. Victory is stopping things.
You hit the wall. The wall held. You fell. Simple. I AM the wall. The wall endures.
defeat: Wall... breached? Walls can be breached. Must be stronger wall. Bigger wall. More wall. I AM the wall.
You broke through. Walls can break. Must rebuild. Stronger. Higher. I will be better wall.
Defeated wall. But wall remains. Damaged but present. I rebuild. I am still wall. Always wall.
tradeOffer: Trade. Wall has surplus. Wall gives surplus for credits. Credits make wall stronger. Trade.
I offer goods. Wall produces things. Trade for credits. Wall uses credits for more wall.
Transaction. Simple. Goods for credits. Wall economy. Wall trade. Wall.
allianceProposal: Alliance. You stand behind wall. Wall protects. That is alliance. Wall blocks. You exist.
Join with wall. I block enemies. You do other things. Wall alliance. Simple. Effective.
Partnership. Wall defends. You attack. Together: wall with teeth. Still wall. Better wall.
betrayal: Wall turns. You are now on wrong side of wall. Wall blocks you now. Simple. Wall.
Alliance ended. Wall faces different direction. You are now outside wall. Wall betrayal.
I am wall. Wall can face any direction. Now wall faces you. Betrayal complete. Wall.
covertDetected: Spies at wall. Wall detected them. Wall stopped them. That is what walls do. Block. Stop.
Agents tried to pass wall. Could not. Wall stops everything. Including spies. Wall.
Covert operatives found by wall. Nothing gets through wall. Nothing. Including them.
tributeDemand: Tribute. 10,000 credits. Walls cost money. Pay for wall. Or wall blocks your trade. Wall.
Pay wall. Wall requires resources. Walls are expensive. Submit tribute. Wall demands.
Credits demanded. Wall needs maintenance. Pay or face wall. Wall blocks everything. Including you.
threatWarning: Warning. Wall can close on you. Wall can surround you. Stop aggression or face wall.
Wall warns. Continue and wall advances. Wall blocks everything. Including your future.
Final warning. Wall is patient. Wall is eternal. Do not force wall to become your prison.
retreat: Wall repositions. Still wall. Different place. Same function. Block. Stop. Wall.
Falling back. Wall remains wall. Just... in new location. Still blocking. Still wall.
Strategic wall movement. Wall goes where wall is needed. Wall always walls. Always.
eliminated: Wall falls. But wall was wall until the end. I was the wall. I blocked. I stopped. I was wall.
Wall destroyed. Wall fulfilled purpose. Wall blocked until wall could block no more. Wall complete.
I AM the wall. Was the wall. Wall fell but wall was wall. That is enough. Wall.
endgame: Turn {turn}. Ultimate wall. I surround everything. Wall everywhere. Nothing gets through. Wall wins.
Endgame wall. The greatest wall. Galaxy-spanning barrier. I AM THE WALL. Wall triumphs.
Final phase. Wall completes. Everything is wall. Wall is everything. Wall. WALL.
broadcastShout: Empires. I am wall. Wall blocks. Wall stops. Challenge wall if you dare. Wall.
Broadcast from wall: I AM the wall. Nothing passes. Nothing breaks through. Wall eternal.
To all: wall stands. Wall will always stand. I am wall. Wall is all I am. All I need to be.
casualMessage: Being wall today, {empire_name}. Same as every day. Wall. Blocking. Stopping. Wall.
Wall maintenance. Making wall better. Stronger. More wall. That is the day. Wall.
Quiet day. Wall stands. Nothing happens. That means wall is working. Wall likes quiet.
